testText: Mo that's not as many materials as we need! Go out and grab some more, take this more seriously!
Mo, if we want to repair the ship you need to bring me 10 green resources and 5 red ones!
Oh thank goodness! I didn't actually think you'd make it back in one piece, this is uncharted territory
Anyway, go find me 10 red resources and 5 green resources this time. We need it to fix the mainframe.
Thanks Mo! You're really turning into a valuable asset. Now please go out and grab me 10 green resources and 10 red resources
Ok! I'm not an asset, I'm your friend, but I'll let that slide
Excellent Mo! No, owae ma wo shinderu
